ğŸ‰
Host Your Event at Hollerbachâ€™s
Whether you're planning an intimate dinner, a company celebration, or a joyful rehearsal, our upstairs event spaces combine warm hospitality, handcrafted German food, and a relaxed, unforgettable atmosphere.
We offer two distinct venues â€” each with its own vibe, layout, and dining experience â€” so you can find the space that fits your vision best.
ğŸ°
Meet the Spaces
ğŸ½ï¸
Knights Hall
Up to 26 guests | Private Room | Family-Style or Plated Dining
Tucked away upstairs in our historic building, Knights Hall is our most private and elegant dining space â€” complete with a single grand table for up to 26 guests. Meals here are served family-style or plated, with elevated multi-course packages that make every gathering feel special.
Explore Knights Hall â
ğŸ»
Hollerbachâ€™s Upstairs Biergarten & Dining Room
Ideal for 45â€“75 guests | Indoor + Rooftop Seating | Buffet-Style Events
This flexible event space features both a cozy indoor dining area (seating for 60) and a breezy outdoor rooftop biergarten (seating for 60). Itâ€™s perfect for wedding rehearsals, corporate events, and large celebrations. Buffet-style service makes for easy flow, and our team handles everything from setup to cleanup.
View Event Packages â
Check the Dates
Upstairs Event Packages
From casual happy hours to wedding weekend dinners, our Upstairs spaces offer flexible, all-inclusive packages for gatherings of all kinds.
No hidden fees, ever.
All package prices include food, staff, setup, cleanup,
7% sales tax
, and
20% gratuity
â€” so what you see is what you pay.
Choose the option that best fits your event, then click to view details and start your booking.
ğŸ’
Wedding Rehearsal Dinner
$42.55 per guest
For 45â€“60 guests Â· Available 5â€“9pm
Pretzel appetizer, 3 entrÃ©es, 3 sides, and dessert â€” buffet-style.
âœ… Includes staffing, drinks, and full-service support
ğŸ’’
Wedding Rehearsal Luncheon
$30.16 per guest
For 45â€“60 guests Â· Available 10amâ€“4pm
Appetizer, 2 entrÃ©es, 2 sides, and salad â€” buffet-style.
âœ… Includes staffing, drinks, and full-service support
ğŸ‰
Celebration Dinner Package
$54.29 per guest
For 45â€“60 guests Â· Available 5â€“10pm
Charcuterie starter, 3 premium entrÃ©es, 4 sides, and dessert trio.
âœ… Our most festive buffet â€” perfect for birthdays & anniversaries
ğŸ¢
Corporate Outing â€“ Classic
$51.75 per guest
For 45â€“60 guests Â· Flexible timing
Pretzel starter, 3 proteins, 3 sides, and dessert buffet.
âœ… Ideal for client lunches, team celebrations, or retreats
ğŸ†
Corporate Outing â€“ Premium
$65.00 per guest
For 45â€“60 guests Â· Flexible timing
Premium buffet with charcuterie, 3 entrÃ©es, 3+ sides, and 2 drink tickets per guest.
âœ… Great for VIP clients, milestone events, or going all out
ğŸ»
Happy Hour Social Package
$51.00 per guest
For 25â€“70 guests Â· Must end by 6:30pm
German-inspired small bites, sausage and cheese, sweet treats, and 2 drink tickets.
âœ… Perfect for mixers, networking events, and casual parties
Start Your Booking
Meeting Room Packages
ğŸ§€
Gather & Graze Meeting Package
$250 flat rate
For 4â€“27 guests Â· Monâ€“Thurs only
Light snack spread with chips, sweets, and your choice of fruit, veggies, or charcuterie.
âœ… Includes space, setup, cleanup, drinks
Start Your Booking
ğŸ¥ª
Working Lunch Meeting Package
$15 per guest + $250 base
For 4â€“27 guests Â· Monâ€“Thurs only
Includes everything in Gather & Graze plus a build-your-own sandwich buffet.
âœ… Includes space, setup, cleanup, drinks
Start Your Booking
Knights Hall Dinning Experiences
Host Thy Noble Gathering at Knightâ€™s Hall
Hark! Should thee seek a venue both grand and regal, venture to Knightâ€™s Hall, perched upon the second floor of Hollerbachâ€™s German Restaurant. Here, within walls adorned with the splendor of German knights and the charm of a medieval castle, awaits a space designed for the distinguished assembly of up to 26 guests.
Summon forth your kinsmen and maidens for a gathering that promises not just merriment but a feast fit for royalty. Whether it be for a stately meeting or a celebratory feast, Knightâ€™s Hall offers exclusive luncheon rendezvous Monday through Friday, with a mere $250 minimum. For all other events, a room fee of $500 is required to ensure thy service and booking are nothing short of majestic.
Feasts within this hallowed hall are tailored to suit the grandeur of the occasion, with culinary offerings ranging from $34 to $100 per guest. Each dish, inspired by the rich traditions of German cuisine, is crafted to transport thee and thy guests to a time of chivalry and honor.
Shouldst thou wish to claim this noble setting for thine own event, send word to our master of feasts, Sebastian, by starting your booking below. Here, in Knightâ€™s Hall, create thy next splendid memory, wrapped in the tapestry of history and luxury.
Start Your Booking
Explore the Space
Curious what the layout looks like?
Check out the floorplan to see how the space flows â€” including the rooftop deck, indoor dining, buffet setup, and more.
Gallery Reel
â€” Sebastian, Event Coordinator
"I canâ€™t wait to meet you and help bring your event to life â€” with plenty of GeumÃ¼tlichkeit, of course! Until then, here are some frequently asked questions to guide you on your planning journey."
â“ Frequently Asked Questions
Q: Whatâ€™s included in the package price?
A: Each package includes food, staffing, setup, cleanup, standard tableware,
7% sales tax
, and
20% gratuity
â€” no surprise fees.
Note:
Knights Hall experiences follow a separate pricing structure with more elevated, plated or family-style service options.
Q: How long can I use the space?
A: Most packages include
up to 3 hours of event time
, with our team handling setup and cleanup before and after.
Need more time? Let us know in advance â€” extended time may incur an additional fee to cover staffing and operations.
Q: Can I bring in outside vendors?
A: Yes! Youâ€™re welcome to bring your own vendors like DJs, florists, or photographers. We also have a
preferred vendor list
featuring local pros we trust and love working with. Weâ€™re happy to share recommendations.
Q: Can I bring my own cake or dessert?
A: Most packages include dessert, and our talented in-house bakery team can customize sweets for any occasion â€” from classic German confections to themed creations (with enough notice!).
We do allow outside cakes in special cases, like elaborate multi-tier wedding cakes, but all outside desserts must be approved in advance.
Q: Can I decorate the space?
A: Absolutely! Feel free to bring florals, table runners, signs, and dÃ©cor to personalize the space.
Please note:
No sparklers, glitter, confetti, or open flames (except candles in approved holders). Let us know in advance what youâ€™re planning and weâ€™ll help with setup where possible.
Q: Do you offer kid-friendly meals?
A: Yes! We can accommodate children with simplified menus and smaller portions. Just let us know how many kids will be attending.
Q: Do you accommodate dietary restrictions?
A: Yes â€” we can provide vegetarian, gluten-free, dairy-free, and allergy-sensitive options with advance notice. Just include any dietary needs when booking.
Q: Is the space ADA accessible?
A: Yes, both
Knights Hall
and
Hollerbachâ€™s Upstairs
are fully ADA compliant. Elevator access and ADA-friendly restrooms are available for all guests.
Q: What kind of A/V setup do you have?
A: We offer flexible audio-visual options for both spaces:
Upstairs Event Space
: Drop-down projection screen, ceiling-mounted projector, wired microphone, and sound system that can play your own playlist or a curated German one.
Knights Hall
: 65â€ TV for presentations, Bluetooth speaker for music, and cozy audio support for smaller gatherings.
Q: What happens if it rains?
A: Our Upstairs space includes both indoor and outdoor seating (up to 60 each), but for safety and comfort we recommend
limiting events to 80 guests
or fewer.
The outdoor Biergarten deck will be closed during
high wind or rain events
, and our team will help adjust your layout as needed. Weâ€™ll stay in communication and do everything we can to adapt for weather.
Q: Is the event space private?
A: Yes. All bookings reserve
private or semi-private use
of the space based on your group size. Youâ€™ll have a dedicated service team for your entire event.
Q: Where can guests park?
A: Free public parking is available in nearby lots and along surrounding streets. Weâ€™ll include parking suggestions and maps in your confirmation email.
Q: Where can guests park? And what about travel or accommodations?
A: Free public parking is available in nearby lots and along the streets surrounding our location in Historic Downtown Sanford.
If youâ€™re planning for out-of-town guests, weâ€™ve created a helpful
Travel & Accommodations Guide
with hotel recommendations, parking tips, airport info, and things to do while you're here.
Feel free to share the link with your guests!
Q: Whatâ€™s your cancellation policy?
A: We require a
credit card authorization
to hold your date (no charge at booking).
Cancel 7+ days in advance: 25% cancellation fee
Cancel within 7 days: refunds are at our discretion
Q: Can I schedule a walk-through before booking?
A: Of course! Weâ€™re happy to show you around and help you visualize your event. Just reach out through the inquiry form to schedule a tour with Sebastian.
Q: What if I donâ€™t see the right package for my event?
A: Weâ€™ve got you covered. Sebastian, our Event Coordinator, will work with you to create a custom package that fits your style, group size, and budget.
Q: What if I need space for more than 100 guests?
A: For groups larger than our upstairs event space can accommodate,
Sebastian can help explore options for a full restaurant buyout
. Heâ€™ll connect with our leadership team to check availability and provide a custom proposal based on your needs, timing, and budget.
Just note your group size in the inquiry form and Sebastian will take it from there.
Catering Coordinator
Catering@Hollerbachs.com
321-788-2789

Q: Can I schedule a walk-through before booking?
A: Of course! Weâ€™re happy to show you around and help you visualize your event. Just reach out through the inquiry form to schedule a tour with Sebastian.
Q: What if I donâ€™t see the right package for my event?
A: Weâ€™ve got you covered. Sebastian, our Event Coordinator, will work with you to create a custom package that fits your style, group size, and budget.
Q: What if I need space for more than 100 guests?
A: For groups larger than our upstairs event space can accommodate,
Sebastian can help explore options for a full restaurant buyout
. Heâ€™ll connect with our leadership team to check availability and provide a custom proposal based on your needs, timing, and budget.
Just note your group size in the inquiry form and Sebastian will take it from there.

Our Familie Origins
A Brief History of Hollerbach's German Restaurant
Hollerbachâ€™s German Restaurant was founded in
2001
by Theo and Linda Hollerbach in the heart of
Historic Downtown Sanford, Florida
. Their vision was to create a place where guests could experience
GemÃ¼tlichkeit
â€”a warm, welcoming atmosphere filled with great food, laughter, and cheer.
From humble beginnings, the restaurant has grown into a Sanford staple, known for its authentic German cuisine, vibrant festivals, and live entertainment. Hollerbachâ€™s celebrates the rich culture of Germany while honoring the spirit of Sanfordâ€™s historic community.
Today, the restaurant spans multiple locations downtown, including:
Hollerbachâ€™s German Restaurant
â€“ The flagship, serving classic dishes like schnitzel, bratwurst, and pretzels.
Market
â€“ A German deli and market offering specialty foods, baked goods, and imported beers.
Outfitters
â€“ A shop featuring authentic German clothing and gifts.
Downtown Sanford itself is a charming destination, filled with
brick-lined streets
,
independent shops
, and
a rich history dating back to the 19th century
. Hollerbachâ€™s is proud to be a cornerstone of this vibrant community, hosting events like Oktoberfest, Krampusnacht, and live music nights that bring locals and visitors together.
Now, as we expand to the
Orlando Sanford International Airport
, weâ€™re excited to bring a taste of Sanfordâ€™s history and Hollerbachâ€™s signature GemÃ¼tlichkeit to travelers from around the world. We hope youâ€™ll share our story with pride and encourage guests to visit our larger restaurant downtown to experience everything we have to offer!
Expanding the Hollerbach Experience
In our commitment to enhance the offerings of Downtown Sanford, we launched additional
brands
that cater to diverse tastes and preferences:
The Joint at West End
â€“ A vibrant spot for American pub classics, The Joint serves up the crispy wings and mozzarella sticks, each bite crafted to perfection. This is your go-to for a casual yet memorable bar grub.
Burgerbachâ€™s at Tuffyâ€™s
â€“ Focusing on Omaha Style smashed burgers, this venue provides a casual yet delicious approach to American classics.
No matter where you are in Downtown Sanford or what youâ€™re in the mood for, Hollerbachâ€™s has something for everyone.
Fun Fact:
Theo Hollerbach is originally from Germany, and his dedication to authentic recipes and cultural traditions is the heart of everything we do.
Theoâ€™s Three Rules
#1 Exceed Expectations
#2 Create a Benefit
#3 Generate a Profit
Kyllburg, Germany - est. 800 AD
Kyllburg is a small town (population 992) in the Eifel region where the Hollerbach family originated. Theoâ€™s grandfather owned a butcher shop there, and his mother was one of the first women in the region to attain the title of certified butcher. Theoâ€™s experiences as a child in his grandfatherâ€™s butcher shop were a key influence for opening his own
German Market
! To Learn more about his hometown and keep up to date
Follow the city of Kyllburg on Facebook!
Linda, Christina, and Theo Hollerbach
